content: first and last st on rs - right side needle 1 onto needle 2 there is now an equal sl - slip number of sts on each needle sm - slip marker ssk - slip slip knit sizes s m2 and xl slip the first st on needle 2 ws - wrong side onto needle 1 there is now an equal number st s - stitch es of sts on each needle toe work the toe decreases as follows round 1 on needle 1 *k1 k0 k1 k0 k1 k0 ssk knit until 3 sts remain k2tog k1* repeat * - * on needle 2 round 2 knit repeat rnds 1 and 2 until 17 20 21 24 25 28 sts remain on each needle and you have just finished round 2 then repeat round 1 only until 9 10 11 12 13 14 sts remain on each needle cut the yarn and graft the toe bulevardi 5 socks page 4/5 chart a chart c chart b chart key bulevardi 5 socks page 5/5
